subject: Re: JUnit 3.8.1
msgSnippet: Aha! Yes, the src.jar works fine, but the example source files in the junit3.8.1.zip file (unzipped directly to a file system) do not (by themselves).  I
messageBody:
Aha! Yes, the src.jar works fine, but the "example" source files in
the junit3.8.1.zip file (unzipped directly to a file system) do not
(by themselves). I mistook these example files for a complete new,
refactored JUnit project. Thanks for the help.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...>
wrote:
> eller_58 wrote:
>
> > I just downloaded JUnit 3.8.1 from www.junit.org and it doesn't
even
> > compile in WebSphere! It looks like someone started to do some
> > refactoring and never finished. The extenstions, framework, and
> > runner packages have all been moved under the junit.tests, but the
> > import statements and inline references in the code have not been
> > updated to match. Is there a simple solution to this?
>
> I assume you mean WSAD.
>
> I don't think you imported the .jar file correctly. The packages
you
> mention are /not/ under junit.tests.
>
> Try importing again and pay special attention to the directory
> structures. Are you importing the source .jar, binary .jar or more?
> --
> J. B. Rainsberger,
> Diaspar Software Services
> http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
> Let's write software that people understand
